summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for the account of Gratitude America, Ltd. for the month of September 2016. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest earned, highlighting the financial activities of the account during this period.

keyFacts: The account balance for Gratitude America, Ltd. as of September 30, 2016, was $1,487,060.93.
Interest earned on the account during September 2016 was $244.41.
There were no service charges or overdraft fees during the statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors related to electronic and non-electronic funds transfers.
The statement covers transactions from September 1, 2016, to September 30, 2016.
